descriptions: ['DescriptionBetterhomes are delighted to bring to the market this spectacular 1 bedroom apartment with an additional study room to the market. Not only is this apartment unique due to its study room, but the apartment also comes with a huge terrace area.\xa0- 1 Bedroom with 2 Bathrooms\xa0- Study Room\xa0- Large Terrace\xa0- 5.5% Net ROI\xa0- Modern Finish\xa0- No construction\xa0- Rented with One cheque payment\xa0Claren Towers are incredibly popular for many reasons, including their stylish modern finish throughout, that sets them apart from the usual Emaar styles in Downtown. location1: ['Garden Homes Frond KDubai, Palm Jumeirah, Garden Homes']
descriptions: ['DescriptionThis immaculate 4 bedroom Arabic Grand Foyer garden home villa has one of the most envious locations anywhere on the Palm, positioned in the middle of the sought after, VIP \x93K Frond\x94. The owner has purchased additional land from Nakheel which makes this plot over 1,000 sq. ft. bigger than any of the standard ones and it also benefits from being next to a signature villa which means the plot is naturally wider and brighter with much more sunlight on the pool-side of the property. The beach, garden and pool are South East facing, which means they have morning and early afternoon sun with glorious sunrises over the iconic Dubai Marina skyline. The built-up-area of the villa is 5,000 sq. ft. and the plot is now a generous 7,747 sq. ft.\xa0Inside and out, the property has been maintained to a very high standard. The ground floor consists of a majlis/office, family living room, kitchen, dining room, large maids room and a double garage. The upper floor contains 2 sea facing bedrooms, 1 with a large private balcony and 2 road facing bedrooms, all of which are very spacious with en-suite bathrooms.This is a rare opportunity to buy one of the most sought after villas and locations anywhere on the Palm, so viewings are highly recommended.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionReady to move in | One Bedroom | Vacant- 1 Bedroom Apartment- 909 sq. ft.- Balcony- Large Living/ dining area- Guest bathroom- DIFC facing- One allocated parking space- Large master bedroom\xa0- En suite\xa0- Service fees AED 12,726This spacious one bedroom apartment comprises of an open plan kitchen,living, dining area and a guest bathroom, balcony overlooking the skyline of DIFC, master bedroom with dressing area and En-suite.There is also one allocated parking space and full access to the towers facilities including swimming pool, gym and tennis courts.DIFC (Dubai International Financial Centre) is a federal free zone and Dubai\x92s global, financial hub created in 2004 in order to promote the \x91growth and development of financial services and related sectors within the UAE economy\x92.\xa0 Its own legal system and courts operate independently of those of the wider UAE with its jurisdiction covering DIFC corporate, commercial, civil, employment, trusts and security law matters.']

descriptions:

As the communities mature residents will be able to enjoy the many communal parks and gardens as well as residents' club, restaurants and cafes, football, basketball and volleyball pitches, children’s play areas, skate park and an amphitheatre outdoor cinema all set within the neighbourhoods.
Adding to the leisure choices of residents, Reem development in Dubai is in close proximity to the Arabian Ranches Golf Club, Dubai Polo & Equestrian Club, and Global Village."]
